TextView.android:text: West Kirby Opening times: Open all year round Lifeguard cover: Yes Parking: You can park along the promenade, but it may be difficult to get a spot. Always check the signs. Parking at Morrisons is for customers only. Dog friendly: Yes Toilets: The public toilets are currently undergoing a revamp, but Morrisons is happy to help, there maybe a queue though! There is also public toilets on Hilbre Island, if you fancy the walk. Local shops: There is a variety of shops, cafes and restaurants Ice cream: There is ALWAYS an ice cream van along the promenade
